product_name: Smith Approach Max Polarized Interchangeable Sunglasses - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Including 3 sets of interchangeable lenses for varying light conditions, these polarized glasses help you customize eye protection for squint- and glare-free hiking and riding.
short_description: Including 3 sets of interchangeable lenses for varying light conditions, these polarized glasses help you customize eye protection for squint- and glare-free hiking and riding.
